title: 77 of the Courts and Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2023 shall
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Courts and Civil Law (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Courts and Civil Law (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) Act 2023 (Section 77) (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited court civil law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2023 (section 77) (commencement) order 2024

title: 77 of the Courts and Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2023 shall
heading: 2. The 11th day of January 2024 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
2. The 11th day of January 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 
77 of the Courts and Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2023 shall 
come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 January, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 12th January, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [6] 3
